1.呼吸性细支气管(respiratory bronchiole):管壁上皮为单层立方上皮,肺泡开口处,上皮移行为单层扁平上皮。 2.肺泡管(alveolar duct):管壁上有许多肺泡开口,切片上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin bronchiolus, bronchiolum, diminutives of late Latin bronchia, denoting the branches of the main bronchi

means.word_mean: 1. any of the smallest bronchial ducts; ending in alveoli
